ovdesc.p: The records in this application as interogated by the account closure application and used to prevent closure of an active account.

desc.p: The transaction reference element of the multi-part id. Will be a standard T24 transaction reference, i.e. prefix, julian date and 5 digit sequence number.
Record Id. This is a multi-part id consisting of the account number and a standard T24 transaction reference. Both elements are mandatory.
The account number that is to be blocked from closure.
The reason that the account is to be blocked from being closed.
